OpenWasteland.description: Barren expanses with clear sightlines. Landmarks visible at great distance. Easy terrain for experienced survivors.
OpenWasteland.scoutingDescription: Clear sightlines make scouting easy. Enemies and features are readily visible.

ModerateRuins.description: Partially collapsed structures with navigable paths. Some route-finding required to avoid obstacles.
ModerateRuins.scoutingDescription: Partial cover requires careful observation. Some threats may be obscured.

DenseRuins.description: Heavily damaged urban areas with many blocked routes. Frequent dead ends and unstable structures.
DenseRuins.scoutingDescription: Many hiding spots make thorough scouting difficult. Enemies could be anywhere.

Labyrinthine.description: Maze-like structures requiring careful path tracking. Easy to get turned around without landmarks.
Labyrinthine.scoutingDescription: Twisting passages severely limit visibility. Scouting is challenging.

GlitchedLabyrinth.description: Reality-warped maze where paths shift and compasses fail. Only the most skilled can navigate these corrupted zones.
GlitchedLabyrinth.scoutingDescription: Reality distortions make accurate observation nearly impossible. Even successful scouting may be unreliable.

excellent.description: Bright light, clear weather, elevated position. Perfect conditions for observation.

good.description: Adequate lighting and minimal obstructions. Slightly better than average conditions.

normal.description: Standard conditions. No bonuses or penalties to scouting.

poor.description: Dim lighting, fog, or light precipitation. Visibility is reduced but scouting is still possible.

terrible.description: Darkness, heavy precipitation, or dense fog. Very difficult to observe surroundings.

staticStorm.description: Reality-distorting storms that warp perception. Observation is extremely unreliable.

survivalKit.description: Basic survival equipment that aids in reconnaissance. Provides minor bonus to scouting checks.

binoculars.description: Optical equipment for long-distance observation. Provides significant bonus to scouting checks.

net6plus.description: Outstanding success - capped at adjacent count

Low.description: Minor threat that can be handled without significant risk. Suitable for direct engagement.

Moderate.description: Competent opponents that require attention. May cause injury if underestimated.

High.description: Dangerous enemies that pose serious risk. Preparation and tactical approach recommended.
High.tacticalRecommendation: Prepare before engaging. Consider tactical approach.

Extreme.description: Potentially lethal encounter. Consider retreat or exceptional preparation before engaging.
Extreme.tacticalRecommendation: Extreme caution advised. Consider retreat or exceptional preparation.

Minor.description: Minor inconvenience that causes minimal harm. Can be ignored in urgent situations.

Moderate.description: Notable hazard that will cause meaningful damage. Should be avoided if possible.
Moderate.tacticalRecommendation: Avoid if convenient, or prepare for damage.

Severe.description: Dangerous hazard that poses significant threat. Should be actively avoided.
Severe.tacticalRecommendation: Find alternate route or use protective equipment.

Lethal.description: Potentially fatal hazard. Extreme caution required.
Lethal.tacticalRecommendation: Do not enter without specialized protection.

Container.description: Storage that may contain items. Can be searched for loot.

ScavengerSign.description: Faction markings that can be interpreted with Wasteland Survival.
ScavengerSign.interactionHint: Can be interpreted with Wasteland Survival.

Mechanism.description: Device that can be activated, deactivated, or bypassed.

ResourceNode.description: Source of raw materials that can be harvested.

Landmark.description: Notable feature useful for navigation or containing lore.

Other.description: Unusual feature that may warrant closer inspection.

success.description: Net successes >= 0. At least 1 room revealed.

failure.message: You strain to observe the surroundings but learn nothing useful. The terrain obscures your view.

scoutingBlockedReasons.noAdjacentRooms: There are no adjacent rooms to scout.
scoutingBlockedReasons.blinded: You cannot see well enough to scout.
scoutingBlockedReasons.insufficientLight: It is too dark to scout effectively.
scoutingBlockedReasons.incapacitated: You are unable to scout in your current condition.

balanceNotes.dcDesign: Base DCs range from 8 (open terrain) to 24 (glitched labyrinth). Combined with poor visibility (+4 max typical), total DCs can reach 28 for the most challenging conditions.
balanceNotes.revelationFormula: Formula of 1 + (net/2) ensures even marginal success reveals something, while rewarding skill investment with more information.
balanceNotes.equipmentDesign: Equipment bonuses are modest (+1 to +2) to avoid trivializing scouting. Skill investment remains the primary factor.
balanceNotes.threatMapping: Experience value thresholds (50/150/400) align with typical encounter difficulty progression.
balanceNotes.visibilityImpact: Static storms (+6) represent the most extreme conditions, making scouting nearly impossible without exceptional skill.
